titleStmt.title: A discourse upon grants and resumptions showing how our ancestors have proceeded with such ministers as have procured to themselves grants of the crown-revenue, and that the forfeited estates ought to be applied towards the payment of the publick debts / by the author of the Essay on ways and means.
titleStmt.author: Davenant, Charles, 1656-1714.

titleStmt.title: A discourse upon grants and resumptions showing how our ancestors have proceeded with such ministers as have procured to themselves grants of the crown-revenue, and that the forfeited estates ought to be applied towards the payment of the publick debts / by the author of the Essay on ways and means.
titleStmt.author: Davenant, Charles, 1656-1714.

notesStmt.note: The author of the Essay on ways and means was Charles Davenant.
"Observations upon the management of the Romans in their publick revenues": p. 46-88.
